title: steps to becoming a gamer girl
body:
step 1
play only female champions ({{champion:103}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} )

step 2
play the mid laners support as well as playing the supports mid lane

step 3
enjoy getting white knighted and never being blamed for anything !

step 4 (OPTIONAL)
make your voice really high pitched (fake it or use a voice changer)
